protein.general_function: Involved in activation of phospholipase C activity by G
protein.specific_function: Receptor for extracellular adenine nucleotides such as ATP and ADP. In platelets binding to ADP leads to mobilization of intracellular calcium ions via activation of phospholipase C, a change in platelet shape, and probably to platelet aggregation

go_class.description: purinergic nucleotide receptor activity, g-protein coupled
cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
